mapper.select: /* getgagevueList 가계부 캘린더/리스트 page - 공통코드 셋팅 */ SELECT g.group_code as group_code , d.detail_code as detail_code , d.detail_name as detail_name , d.note as note FROM tb_group_code g LEFT JOIN tb_detail_code d ON g.group_code = d.group_code WHERE 1=1 AND g.use_yn = 'Y'

/*selectgagevueOne 가계부 캘린더/리스트 page - 상세 조회 */ SELECT mn_no, mbr_no, mn_dtm, mn_use_dvs, ( SELECT MAX(detail_name) FROM tb_detail_code WHERE 1=1 AND mn_use_dvs = detail_code ) AS mn_use_dvs_name, mn_pay_dvs, mn_use_dvs_det, ( SELECT MAX(detail_name) FROM tb_detail_code WHERE 1=1 AND mn_use_dvs_det = detail_code ) AS mn_use_dvs_det_name, mn_use_memo, mn_rgst_dtm, mn_rgst_id, mn_upd_dtm, mn_upd_id, mn_amount FROM tb_mn WHERE 1=1
AND mn_no = #{mn_no}
mapper.insert: /* gagevueInsert 가계부 캘린더/리스트 page - 저장 */ INSERT INTO tb_mn SELECT CAST(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(mn_no AS UNSIGNED)) + 1, 1) AS CHAR), #{mbr_no}, #{mn_dtm}, #{mn_use_dvs}, #{mn_pay_dvs}, #{mn_amount}, #{mn_use_dvs_det}, #{mn_use_memo}, now(), #{mn_rgst_id}, now(), #{mn_rgst_id} FROM tb_mn
